args.subject: Resume Template Download Issue
args.body:
Hi Alice,

I tried to access www.resume_templates.com to download the resume template as you requested, but the website is currently inaccessible. I made several attempts, but the issue persists.

Would you like me to look for a similar resume template from another reliable source? Alternatively, if you have another link or a copy of the template, please let me know.

Best regards,
Emma

content.content: The email has been sent successfully.
